wikipedia_page.main: General Sir William Norman Roy Scotter,  (9 February 1922 – 5 February 1981) was a senior British Army officer who served as commander-in-chief, British Army of the Rhine from September 1978 until October 1980.

response: | General Sir William Scotter || 27 December 1980 || 5 February 1981 † ||
* General Sir William Scotter KCB, OBE, MC Commander-in-Chief, British Army of the Rhine, from September 1978 until October 1980.
File:WilliamScotterGrave.JPG|Headstone of Sir William Scotter KCB OBE MC
* General Sir William Scotter (1922–1981), Senior NATO commander, decorated in Burma during WW2. He reviewed the St Bees C.C.F., at St Bees, in 1977.
